text: This is a list of heads of state of Algeria. ==Key== ;Political parties * * * ;Other factions * ;Status * ==List== Name Portrait Elected Term of office Political party — Ferhat Abbas فرحات عباس – 19 September 1958 9 August 1961 National Liberation Front — Benyoucef Benkhedda بن يوسف بن خدة – 9 August 1961 27 September 1962 National Liberation Front — Abderrahmane Farès عبدالرحمن فارس – 13 April 1962 25 September 1962 National Liberation Front — Ferhat Abbas فرحات عباس – 25 September 1962 15 September 1963 National Liberation Front 1 Ahmed Ben Bella أحمد بن بلّة 1963 15 September 1963 19 June 1965 National Liberation Front — Revolutionary Council — 19 June 1965 10 December 1976 Military 2 Houari Boumédiène هواري بومدين 1976 10 December 1976 27 December 1978 National Liberation Front — Rabah Bitat رابح بيطاط – 27 December 1978 9 February 1979 National Liberation Front 3 Chadli Bendjedid شاذلي بن جديد 1979 1984 1988 9 February 1979 11 January 1992 National Liberation Front — Abdelmalek Benhabyles عبد المالك بن حبيلس – 11 January 1992 14 January 1992 National Liberation Front 4 Mohamed Boudiaf محمد بوضياف – 14 January 1992 29 June 1992 Party of the Socialist Revolution 5 Ali Kafi علي حسين كافي – 2 July 1992 31 January 1994 National Liberation Front 6 Liamine Zéroual اليمين زروال 1995 31 January 1994 27 November 1995 27 April 1999 Independent 7 Abdelaziz Bouteflika عبد العزيز بوتفليقة 1999 2004 2009 2014 27 April 1999 2 April 2019 National Liberation Front — Abdelkader Bensalah عبد القـادر بن صالح – 9 April 2019 19 December 2019 National Rally for Democracy 8 Abdelmadjid Tebboune عبد المجيد تبون 2019 19 December 2019 Incumbent National Liberation Front ==Other websites== * World Statesmen - Algeria Category:Algeria-related lists
title: List of heads of state of Algeria
